Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Nomad
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An armoured all-rounder vehicle, the Nomad performs remarkably well in all categories with an excellent cargo and passenger capacity. Performs well in any and all terrain, with some minor issues in the cold.

A relatively general purpose tier 3, effectively being a lightly armoured APC. While it excels in off road capabilities and works well in all situations, other vehicles perform even better on roads or in specialized tasks.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
